Title: Director of Product Management
Description: Promoted to Director after one year -  focused on team building, strategy and driving results across Direct to Consumer (App, Web), Seller (App, Web), Data/ML and backend platform services.

KeyResults.Main: Drove development of product strategy to support business objectives, providing direction to 10 dev teams.
KeyResults.Sub1: Partnered with Engineering, Design and Data Science to deliver exceptional customer experiences to sellers, internal Operations and DTC Customers.
KeyResults.Sub2: Championed data driven decision making through experimentation and test and learn approach.
KeyResults.Sub3: Utilized user research and established product dashboards to track progress.

KeyResults.Main: Championed the sunset of legacy product catalog/asset systems, achieving 15% cost savings through development of an extensible homegrown system built to support business growth.
KeyResults.Sub1: Drove business case creation and resource allocation discussions with the organization.
KeyResults.Sub2: Set strategy and direction for the teams executing development.
KeyResults.Sub3: Led ongoing project update sessions providing accountability and direction for the company.

KeyResults.Main: Accountable for growth of key metrics across platform (Seller, DTC, Ops, Seller).
KeyResults.Sub1: Led implementation of key marketing tech for email, social, affiliate and other channels.
KeyResults.Sub2: Increased seller listings by 25% in H1 `22 through launching  new seller android/iOS app.
KeyResults.Sub3: Improved seller price competitiveness by 10% in 2022 through introducing a machine learning competitive pricing data model in collaboration with our data science team.

Title: Senior Product Manager
Description: First product hire - established product standards and drove execution for a 12 member software engineering team.

KeyResults.Main: Drove $10M in sales in 2019 through launching new seller focused price management functionality & event driven email messaging to motivate sellers to take action on pricing opportunities.
Improved seller NPS score by 60% through focus on improving seller payment process and experience.
Designed & launched successful shopify dropship application, contributing $8M in new revenue through effective management of cross-functional teams, market analysis, and needs assessment.
Improved search conversion by 25% and retention by 22% through implementing Algolia & A/B testing different strategies/configurations.
Optimized Rest API integrations with 3rd party platforms, improving retention by 15% through improved data validation and catalog operations.
Drove improved inventory accuracy and reduced loss by 45% through design of new optimized inventory management REST API with a focus on performance and relevancy of results.
Improved returns efficiency by 50% freeing up 20 hours a week in employee time by reducing 6 step process across multiple applications down to 3 in a single screen.

Title: Director of Product Management
Description: Led 10 person product & design team which scaled to over 12B in GMV and $25M in ARR.  Partnered with Enterprise Customers, Sales, Customer Success and Data Ops to attract and delight SaaS customers.

KeyResults.Main: Hired and mentored 8 PMs & 2 Product Designers, developing a culture of trust and accountability.
Developed product strategy to meet business goals, focused on continuing to drive growth in enterprise customers, develop new SMB customer growth and expansion into international markets.
Successfully designed and launched new premium buyer focused mobile & web apps, which generated $6M in new business through 2018.

Partnered with Customer Success, achieving 16% increase in retention rate QoQ by defining critical platform adoption metrics, identifying high-risk accounts, standardizing retention playbook and collecting key feedback on customer needs.
Drove 180% YoY new customer growth by leveraged deep technical expertise to develop customer facing REST API and file based integrations allowing more customers to integrate to the platform.
Improved search conversion by 26% through implementing optimized search experience across web/app.
KeyResults.Sub1: Utilized google analytics to assess existing search metrics and identified areas of opportunity.
KeyResults.Sub2: Researched relevant features and worked with design on UX/UI consideration.
KeyResults.Sub3: A/B Tested new experiences & features to assess impact on key metrics.

Title: Product Manager
Description: Product Manager for flagship iPad App.

KeyResults.Main: Utilized user research to redesign & launch flagship iOS iPad app, driving 10% YoY improvement to transactions through focus on UX improvements and enhanced reporting features.
KeyResults.Sub1: Worked with partners in CSM/Sales & Customers to collect feedback and develop product outcomes.
KeyResults.Sub2: Led design sprints to produce working prototypes and present for feedback.
KeyResults.Sub3: Created support documentation for internal & external customers.

KeyResults.Main: Drove $1M in new business through development of go-to-market strategy and international iPad app launch.
KeyResults.Sub1: Created competitive analysis to assess opportunities and led feedback sessions with prospects.
KeyResults.Sub2: Saw development of integrated translations and multi-currency support through to production release.

KeyResults.Main: Led product calls with new customers to assess needs and set up onboarding plan to utilize existing platform.
Designed and built first internal product usage dashboard utilizing SQL & Tableau.
KeyResults.Sub1: Developed integration with google analytics to import usage data into a centralized database.
KeyResults.Sub2: Created SQL reports to combine google analytics and order transaction data.

Title: QA Engineer - Web/Mobile
Description: Product Manager for flagship iPad App.

KeyResults.Main: Key member of QA team accountable for writing comprehensive test cases and provided critical support for multiple production applications.
Developed Selenium framework for automated testing, reducing regression testing from 1-2 days to 2.5 hours.
Reduced overall bug triage time from an average of 6 days to 2 days over a 6-month period, by setting up process and tools to quickly triage issues and route to the correct team.
Collaborated closely with developers and cross-functional teams, resolving complex issues and delivering all applications on time and with the highest level of quality.
